General.Name: Makara Mining Corp
General.Description: Makara Mining Corp., a mineral exploration company, focuses on the acquisition, exploration, and development of gold properties. It holds interest in the Rude Creek Property located in the Whitehorse Mining District in the Yukon Territory; Win Property; and the Idaho Creek Property located in the Whitehorse Mining District in the Yukon Territory. The company also holds an option to acquire the interest in the Kenora Gold Property located in Kenora Mining Region, Ontario. Makara Mining Corp. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2
